comments:
When IAC is disabled and a new external java app launch configuration is created, the following exception is generated:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: port out of range:-1
	at java.net.InetSocketAddress.<init>(InetSocketAddress.java:97)
	at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:236)

	at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.insecureConnect(BaseConnectUtil.java:371)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.connect(BaseConnectUtil.java:257)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.security.internal.util.BaseConnectUtil.connect(BaseConnectUtil.java:542)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.common.ui.trace.internal.util.PDCoreUtil.profileConnect(PDCoreUtil.java:827)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.deleg.application.PIDelegateHelper$JVMVersionDetector.retrieveVersionOutput(PIDelegateHelper.java:459)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.jvmti.client.internal.launcher.TICollectorFiltration.include(TICollectorFiltration.java:29)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.core.DataCollectorTreeContentProvider$DeferredDataCollectorAdapter.fetchDeferredChildren(DataCollectorTreeContentProvider.java:314)
	at org.eclipse.ui.progress.DeferredTreeContentManager$1.run(DeferredTreeContentManager.java:196)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
